attributes.additional_details:
We want F1 to remain "fulltime" on freeview for the future and not Sky Sports for the next 7 years.

We the UK "F1 public" want Formula 1 to remain on the BBC or another Freeview channel and stop this new contract with FOM by forcing us to pay money to watch the other half of the season.

Get a deal that is fair for the fans and not your bank accounts.

We wont be forced into paying Sky Sports for something we have had free for many years...
